name: digimon-searcher-monorepo
description: Scripts raiz para rodar backend e frontend juntos

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n back,front -c green,cyan "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n back,front -c green,cyan "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend start"
